value.title: StarCraft 2: KOREAN VS EUROPEAN ZERG VS ZERG! (Solar vs Serral)
value.excerpt: Zerg versus Zerg is one of the hardest matchups to play well in StarCraft 2. Since all units have very high damage output compared to their hitpoints, it can be over in a flash.
